title: X Rebirth v1.15 update 3DM [VIPER666]
description:
--===VIPER666===--


Update v1.15 and crack provided by 3DM.

1. Extract everything into your game folder overwriting the existing files
2. Enjoy the game


PS: If your game starts in Chinese delete lang.dat in the game folder

Changelog:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed a stall when loading savegames.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed characters crouching when you talk to them.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed ships still following you when you remove them from your squad.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Removed "Show me your skills" option for NPCs that cannot be hired.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Increased voice volume in videos.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Added feedback to indicate when you cannot hire someone because your crew is full (note: Yisha tells you, but there is currently no voice, only subtitles).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Added data to try to help nVidia Optimus software select the correct GPU.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Added fallback to show subtitles if the voice for a text line is missing, even if subtitles are off.
